scripts.deploy:dev: aws s3 sync out/ s3://355294401173-frontend-dev/ --exclude index.html && aws s3 cp out/index.html s3://355294401173-frontend-dev/index.html --cache-control no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --content-type text/html
scripts.deploy:prd: aws s3 sync out/ s3://355294401173-frontend-prd/ --exclude index.html && aws s3 cp out/index.html s3://355294401173-frontend-prd/index.html --cache-control no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --content-type text/html
